Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) have been considered as a promising energy conversion and storage device.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Cells with Phase-Inversion Tape-Casted Hydrogen Electrode and SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-δ Oxygen Electrode for High-Performance Reversible Power Generation and Hydrogen Production

Sentencas: However, state-of-the-art cells' practical application with conventionally fabricated Ni-(Y2O3)(0.08)(ZrO2)(0.92) (YSZ) cermet hydrogen electrode and La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 perovskite oxygen electrode is strongly limited by the unsatisfactory performance.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Cells with Phase-Inversion Tape-Casted Hydrogen Electrode and SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-δ Oxygen Electrode for High-Performance Reversible Power Generation and Hydrogen Production

Sentencas: Instead, new advances in cell materials and fabrication techniques that can lead to significant performance enhancements are urgently demanded.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Cells with Phase-Inversion Tape-Casted Hydrogen Electrode and SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-δ Oxygen Electrode for High-Performance Reversible Power Generation and Hydrogen Production

Sentencas: Here, we report a high-performance reversible SOC that consisted of a combination of SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-delta (SSNC) and phase-inversion tape-casted Ni-YSZ, which served as the oxygen and hydrogen electrode, respectively.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Cells with Phase-Inversion Tape-Casted Hydrogen Electrode and SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-δ Oxygen Electrode for High-Performance Reversible Power Generation and Hydrogen Production

Sentencas: The hydrogen electrode synthesized from phase-inversion tape-casting showed a high porosity of 60.8%, providing sufficient active sites for hydrogen oxidation in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) mode and H2O electrolysis in the solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Cells with Phase-Inversion Tape-Casted Hydrogen Electrode and SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-δ Oxygen Electrode for High-Performance Reversible Power Generation and Hydrogen Production

Sentencas: A cm(-2) was obtained at 1.3 V in SOEC mode.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Cells with Phase-Inversion Tape-Casted Hydrogen Electrode and SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3-δ Oxygen Electrode for High-Performance Reversible Power Generation and Hydrogen Production

Sentencas: Hence, these results reveal that the simultaneous optimization of oxygen and hydrogen electrodes is a pragmatic strategy that improves the performance of SOCs, which may significantly accelerate the commercialization of such an attractive technology.
